scripts.build:web: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const { execSync } = require('child_process');fs.mkdirSync('dist',{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync('index.html','dist/index.html');try{const pluginJs=path.join(process.cwd(),'../../packages/tauri-plugin/dist-js/index.js');if(fs.existsSync(pluginJs)){fs.mkdirSync('dist/plugins',{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(pluginJs,'dist/plugins/wdio-plugin.js');}}catch(e){console.warn('Failed to copy plugin JS:',e);}"
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:web && tauri build
scripts.build:debug: npm run build:js && npm run build:web && tauri build --debug
